Develop and coordinate infrastructure projects (e.g., the introduction of cloud data lakes & data warehouses) Write software components in languages such as Java (Spring Boot), Python (PySpark, Flask), JavaScript/Typescript (Vue, React, Angular) Setting up development and deployment infrastructure (DevOps) in cloud or on-premises environments. Research and prototype new ideas for disrupting day-to-day operations & create new value for our clients across all industries Implement customer-specific use cases and guide our client through the entire lifecycle from creative workshops to implementation Apply your skills to help our clients improve their data usage through data modeling & data visualization What we offer you:Access to work on projects across industries (large and mid-market companies in Banking, Insurance, Automotive, Retail, etc.) Broaden your skills through interdisciplinary work and training in the areas of data engineering, cloud architecture, and data science Benefit from industry-leading cooperations in the cloud, BI, and AutoML field Very active social program - including training, conferences, team buildings, Reply Xchange, communities of practices, and hackathons Work in an open, flat environment, within a broad Reply knowledge-sharing network Award-winning office space in downtown Munich with access to “Stammstrecke” You choose your state-of-the-art equipment Public transport ticket with Deutschlandticket Gym-membership subsidy for a gym of your choice Flexible work environment between client, Reply office, and remote work Job requirements:Minimum Job Requirements / Qualifications:Experience and/or interest in the area of artificial intelligence Experience in relational databases & knowledge of SQL Experience in Software Engineering and related principles with knowledge of at least one additional programming language (e.g. Python, Java, …) Knowledge of visualization and frontend technologies strongly preferred Bachelor’s and Master’s degree and a strong quantitative background, for example in Business Informatics, Business Science (with an additional background in Informatics), Computer Science Fluent in English and able to speak German at least at a B2 Level You are based in Munich, Germany Desired:Experience in cloud infrastructure development and management Experience in the consulting industry Knowledge of technologies like Kubernetes, Docker, or Spark and principles like MLOps is a plus. Interest in (agile) project management. What are you waiting for?Join our team at Machine Learning Reply in Munich!If you have any further questions or would like to apply, please do not hesitate to write directly to Jonas Heepen (j.heepen@reply.de).

Data Analyst.description: Your roleWe are looking for an experienced Marketing Data Analyst to join our growing team and play a critical role in optimizing our marketing efforts across all paid channels. data-driven marketing and love turning insights into business impact, we’d love to hear from you!Develop a holistic view of the acquisition funnel, from first touchpoint to conversion, and identify etc.)Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau, Looker, or QlikExperience with testing methodologies (geo-lift tests, incrementality testing)Ability to translate complex data into clear Python or R for advanced analyticsWhat we offerAn appealing discount on all of our products – from essential oils to vitamins & nutrientsWe offer 28 days of paid time off per year plus up to 5 days off between Christmas and New YearThe Urban Sports Club membership and either Swapfiets bike rental or a subsidy for the BVG ticketA healthy balance is important to us: we offer a hybrid work model and 'workation'Receive various discounts of up to more than 50 percent on attractive brands such as Flaconi, Bosch, Apple or ExpediaYou will be given real ownership and plenty of room for new initiatives, as well as the opportunity to contribute your expertise and implement your great ideasInviting office spaces with access to plenty of organic teas and superfoods from around the worldWe like to celebrate each other! Regular tea & office parties, Christmas and summer feasts and various influencer events such as Women's DayApply for this jobAbout UsSunday Natural emerged from a long-standing passion and research in the fields of health, healing, and personal growth. The lack of natural, high-quality products on the market was the original motivation for founding Sunday Natural in 2013. We aim to produce the products we ourselves would love to buy – as natural as possible, absolutely pure, free from any additives, and of the highest quality. In a strategic partnership with CVC, Sunday Natural is now one of Germany's most renowned quality manufacturers, with its own research and development department in Berlin. For the continuous improvement of our products, we collaborate with selected research institutes, scientists, therapists, farmers, and professional associations.We take our ecological responsibility very seriously: Our entire range is therefore vegetarian, mostly vegan. We also go our own way when it comes to packaging: the majority of our products are packaged in glass and are therefore almost completely recyclable.We have a diverse team of more than 240 employees from over 40 nationalities, still growing but at a sustainable rate. Our aim is to work in a collaborative, supportive and inclusive work environment with a diverse group of motivated, talented, and visionary colleagues.We highly value equality of opportunity and inclusivity, and we would like to particularly encourage women and candidates from under-represented backgrounds to apply, even if you don’t match with 100% of the requirements.

becoming part of a fast-growing, diverse and international team of tech enthusiasts and entrepreneurially-minded who build our success story togetherCompany culture is important to us - we strive to continuously develop a positive, vibrant and inspiring environment that enables everyone to thrive both personally and professionallyGet involved! We have plenty of initiatives and love to see people from all department enthusiastically participating and shaping our future together in different cross-department projectsYour work-life balance is important to us too - we offer flexible working hours, hybrid working and the possibility of workcations (in accordance with our company policy)We always remember to have fun along the way, both in our day-to-day work and at our regular team events on site in our offices in Munich, Copenhagen, Odense, Lisbon and Prague or onlineYou are the most valuable asset to our company which is why we’re happy to offer awesome benefits like our personal development budget, job-related language courses and a lot more (depending on your location) to focus on your well beingAbout UsWe are driven by our values #BeBrave, #BetterTogether, #LeadbyExample, #InnovateWithPurpose, #PassionForPrivacy, #GiveBack and #ComeAsYouAre. They show what we believe in and how we work. They help make our team special and guide us in everything we do. They're the heart of our company and inspire us to do our best every day.We strive to create a diverse, equitable, and inclusive environment (DEI) where everyone feels valued, respected, and empowered to reach their full potential. We believe that our different backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives are our greatest strengths — so we are committed to building with them as we foster innovation and drive our success.We recognize that this is an ongoing journey. By embracing DEI principles, we will create a more just and equitable society, and we are proud to play our part in making this vision a reality.We are #BetterTogether.

Data Analyst.title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst – Central Reporting (f/m/x)
Data Analyst.description: Company DescriptionOur goal is a solar power system on every roof, a storage unit in every house, and an e-car in every garage. How are we achieving this? Enpal makes solar easy: we rent out solar power systems, electricity storage and wallboxes at an all-inclusive rate, supplemented by a low-cost green electricity tariff, and intelligently networked into an integrated overall solution.We are just at the beginning of our journey to becoming Europe's largest energy company. That's why we're looking for talented people to accompany us on this journey, leave their footprint and celebrate successes together with us. At Enpal, you will find a dynamic working environment as well as the space to develop yourself personally and professionally and to use your strengths effectively.As the first green unicorn in Germany and the fastest-growing energy company in Europe (FT1000 Ranking 2022 by Financial Times & Statista), we continue to advance our mission of green energy for everyone. Be part of this success story and change the world with us!Job DescriptionStrategic Partnership: Collaborate with the VP of Financial BI, VP of FP&A, and C-Suite leadership to align business intelligence strategies with financial goals. Work cross-functionally with Marketing, Sales, and Finance to deliver data-driven insights that support business growth and operational efficiency. Project Ownership: Manage the intake and prioritization of data projects, ensuring clear goals, scope, and expected impact. Work with stakeholders to refine requirements, prioritize initiatives, and drive execution in alignment with business objectives. End-to-End Data Solutions: Own the full lifecycle of data solutions, from scoping and MVP development to data modeling, implementation, and validation. Work closely with data engineers, analysts, and business leaders to ensure solutions are scalable and fit-for-purpose. Data Visualization & Dashboarding: Develop effective, actionable dashboards and data products that translate complex data into clear, intuitive insights. Apply best practices in data visualization to communicate key information effectively across all levels, from operational teams to executive leadership. Data-Driven Decision Making: Conduct ad-hoc analyses and exploratory data work to identify trends, patterns, and insights. Provide proactive recommendations that drive business performance and ensure ongoing monitoring of key metrics. Enhancing Data Culture: Elevate analytical standards and best practices within the organization. Share knowledge, refine methodologies, and stay up to date with the latest BI, data visualization, and analytics trends.Qualifications5+ years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics, or a related field, with a strong understanding of customer acquisition, finance, and business performance drivers. Technical expertise in SQL, ETL processes, and BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar. Our stack includes dbt, Snowflake, Streamlit, and Tableau. Strong data visualization and dashboarding skills, with the ability to create clear, intuitive, and actionable insights from complex datasets. Experience with Python or R for data analysis is a plus, particularly in advanced forecasting methods (e.g., econometrics, time series analysis). Proven problem-solving skills, with experience in automating reporting workflows and leveraging data to improve decision-making. Strong collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to engage business, analytics, and engineering teams to drive impactful solutions. Ability to present data products and insights effectively to stakeholders at all management levelsAdditional InformationAt Enpal, we are proud of the diversity of our team. No decisions are made based on skin color, religion or religious belief, ethnic or national origin, nationality, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, or age, either during recruitment or employment. We strongly encourage women, neurodivergent people, people of color, and LGBTQ(+) people to apply. Enpal stands for a safe workplace and takes action against discrimination and harassment of any kind.

Data Analyst.title: Business Intelligence-Analyst (w/m/d)
Data Analyst.description: duagon, ein schnell expandierendes Technologieunternehmen mit Hauptsitz in der Schweiz, ist ein führender Anbieter von Kommunikations-, Computer- und Steuerungstechnik sowie Projektierungs- und Entwicklungsdienstleistungen für systemkritische Applikationen im Bahn- und Medizintechnik-Markt. duagons vielseitig einsetzbares Soft- und Hardware-IP schafft innovative, zuverlässige und sichere Produkte, die es Kunden ermöglichen, ihre Technologie-Roadmap effizient zu gestalten und umzusetzen.An unserem Standort in Nürnberg entwickeln und fertigen wir hochzuverlässige Computerbaugruppen und -systeme, die unter extremen Umgebungsbedingungen in mobilen, industriellen und sicherheitskritischen Anwendungen eingesetzt werden. Für unseren Firmensitz in Nürnberg suchen wir ab sofort: Business Intelligence Analyst (w/m/d) Als Business Intelligence Analyst (Sales Excellence) sind Sie für die Entwicklung, Pflege und Überwachung von BusinessIntelligence-Tools und -Systemen verantwortlich, um wichtige Einblicke in die Vertriebsleistung des Unternehmens zu gewinnen. In dieser Rolle sind Sie für die Analyse und Interpretation von Daten verantwortlich. Zusätzlich sind Sie für die Pflege und Verwaltung von Verkaufsdatenbanken und Stammdaten zuständig und stellen sicher, dass die Daten korrekt und aktuell sind. Ihre Aufgaben:Entwicklung, Implementierung und Verbesserung der Business-Intelligence-Tools und -Systeme zur Überwachung der Vertriebsleistung sowie Identifizierung der Trends und ChancenAnalyse der Verkaufsdaten, zur Gewinnung von Erkenntnissen und Empfehlungen für Veränderungen und VerbesserungenErstellung von Berichten zur Überwachung der Vertriebsleistung für das ManagementPflege und Aktualisierung von Verkaufsdatenbanken und StammdatenZusammenarbeit mit dem Vertriebsteam zur Verbesserung der Datenqualität sowie Optimierung der Erfassung der VerkaufsdatenSicherstellung der Qualitätsstandards unserer Business-Intelligence-Tools und -Systeme sowie Abgleich der Anforderungen des UnternehmensSchulung und Unterstützung der Benutzer bei der Nutzung von Business-Intelligence-Tools und - SystemenIhr ProfilAbgeschlossenes Studium der Informatik, Wirtschaftsinformatik oder einem verwandten BereichNachgewiesene Erfahrung mit Business-IntelligenceTools und -SystemenAusgezeichnete Kenntnisse in Datenanalyse-Tools und -Technologien wie, Excel, Tableau, Power BI oder ähnlichen WerkzeugenErfahrung mit QLIK, Sugar, SAP von Vorteil sowie in der Verwaltung von Verkaufsdatenbanken und StammdatenFähigkeit, komplexe Daten in klare, prägnante Berichte und Präsentationen umzuwandelnHervorragende analytische Fähigkeiten und die Fähigkeit, komplexe Probleme zu lösenAusgezeichnete Kommunikations- und zwischenmenschliche Fähigkeiten zur Interaktion mit unseren StakeholdernFähigkeit, unabhängig und unter Druck zu arbeiten, um Fristen einzuhaltenGute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und SchriftWir bieten Ihnen: Eine herausfordernde und abwechslungsreiche Tätigkeit mit großen Freiräumen und praxisnahen AufgabenEine sehr gute Betreuung durch unsere erfahrenen SpezialistenEin angenehmes Arbeitsumfeld und eine teamorientierte ArbeitskulturIhre aussagekräftige Bewerbung können Sie uns gerne – unter Angabe Ihrer Gehaltsvorstellung sowie dem frühestmöglichen Eintrittstermin – per Mail unter Applications-NBG@duagon.com zukommen lassen.

Data Analyst.title: Data Analyst - Product
Data Analyst.description: When travelers are searching for a hotel, we want the obvious choice to be trivago! Our leading metasearch engine is super fast and constantly optimized - enabling millions of travelers to compare hotel prices from hundreds of booking sites and find great deals in just a few clicks. We use cutting-edge technology, real-time auction, and machine learning techniques with petabytes of data to create an experience - time and money saved! In the lively city of Düsseldorf, we seize opportunities to learn everyday, innovate, and make an enduring mark on the travel industry. At trivago you will find those who aren’t afraid of change but rather embrace it, turning every challenge into a pathway for growth. Join trivago, work with a great team, and grow with us!Join us in making a differenceOur Product Intelligence team is on the lookout for a passionate and detailed Data Analyst to join us in our mission to deliver an exceptional product to our customers. In this role, you'll have the opportunity to work with some of the richest datasets from the travel industry, drawing conclusions from A/B tests to push our product to the next level. Whether it’s exploratory analysis, or evaluating feature tests, your results will empower our product teams to enhance the user experience.If data-driven product development excites you and you're looking for a role where your insights will matter, we want to hear from you.Get an inside look at data science at trivago:How you’ll make an impact:Analyze and interpret user behavior to uncover insights that will inform key business decisionsProvide analytical consultation on product testing – from test set up, to logging specification – to product teamsMonitor data regularly to spot trends, find anomalies, and analyze active A/B tests to elevate our productBe responsible for your KPIs, from definition and data processing, to reporting and visualizationProactively communicate and share your conclusions and educate on interpreting and analyzing results tailored to the audienceDeliver datasets to build data-driven product featuresWork closely with product teams to find, define, and validate business opportunities and user problems worth solvingWhat you'll need to thrive:Proven minimum 6 years' work experience as a Data Analyst or similar role with focus on statistics, data exploration, and visualizationAnalytical skills with the ability to draw conclusions from significant amounts of data with a keen eye for detail in order to create actionable insightsSolid knowledge and practical experience in A/B testinga good understanding of data analysis and statistical concepts with experience in applying themExcellent knowledge of data querying and transformation (SQL) and at least one programming language, preferable R or PythonExperience with big data technologies such as Hadoop or Big queryAbility to prioritize effectively and work independently in a fast-paced and ever-changing environmentProactive communication skills for dealing with non-technical stakeholders in a clear and straightforward wayStand out with:Being comfortable with dashboarding tools like Tableau and Looker Experience in data orchestration tools like Oozie or Airflow relevant working experience as a Product Analyst Worried about missing a few requirements? Still apply, and express your motivation as you may just be the right candidate for this or other roles!What you can look forward to:As you grow, so do we.This is why at trivago, we prioritize your development, offer personalized coaching through Nilo, and provide workshops, educational meetups, conferences, free online learning courses, and access to a fully-equipped campus library.Moving to join us?No problem. You can count on the visa support from our talent support team, a relocation package, interest-free newcomer loan, free language classes, regular team and company-wide events to build experiences together.Life happens.We offer self-determined vacation (with a minimum of 25 vacation days), flexible working hours, 2 WFH days weekly, the chance to work remotely for 20 days abroad, free access to the Heynanny platform for personalized nanny assistance, and an on-campus kids room.Enjoy your office days.Use your daily canteen budget to share lunch with colleagues in our canteen, help yourself to complimentary snacks and drinks in our kitchens, stay healthy with our on-site gym and sports classes, and enjoy the comfort of ergonomic desks and focused work areas.Thank you for considering a career at trivago! Our commitment to fostering an inclusive and enriching environment for all talents is at the heart of what we do. We understand that embarking on a new job opportunity is a blend of excitement and curiosity. Should any questions arise before you apply, feel free to reach out to us at joinus@trivago.com. Join us in our mission to make a positive impact on global travel, we look forward to your application!

Data Analyst.title: Junior Consultant (m/w/d) – Power BI
Data Analyst.description: 📍 Standort: Remote oder vor Ort (in Dortmund) | 🕒 Vollzeit | 📅 Ab sofort💸 Gehalt: 45.000 – 55.000 € JahresgehaltWer wir sindWir sind die DatenPioniere, eines der führenden Beratungsunternehmen für Power BI- und Fabric-Implementierungen in Deutschland. Mit uns wird BI nicht nur smarter, sondern auch klimafreundlicher. Unser Ziel? CFOs und Controller zu begeistern und die Welt der Daten auf das nächste Level zu bringen.Jetzt suchen wir DICH:Einen Junior Consultant (m/w/d), der Lust hat, mit uns die Datenwelt zu revolutionieren und spannende Projekte umzusetzen.Ein Tag bei uns:Check-in: Starte flexibel im Homeoffice oder in unserem modernen Büro in Dortmund – mit deinem Lieblingsgetränk in der Hand.Projekte rocken: Unterstütze unser Team bei der Datenmodellierung, Dashboard-Erstellung und Implementierung von Power BI-Lösungen.Kunden begeistern: Arbeite an Workshops und Schulungen mit, die unseren Kunden den Umgang mit Daten erleichtern.Feierabend: Stolz auf das, was du heute erreicht hast – und bereit für neue Herausforderungen morgen.Was du mitbringst:Erste Erfahrungen mit Power BI oder vergleichbaren BI-Tools.Ein hohes Maß an Eigeninitiative und den Wunsch, dich stetig weiterzuentwickeln.Analytisches Denken und Spaß daran, datenbasierte Lösungen zu finden.Kommunikationsstärke und Freude an der Zusammenarbeit mit Kunden und Kollegen.Gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift.Ein abgeschlossener Studiengang mit IT-, Wirtschafts- oder Datenbezug ist ein Plus, aber keine Pflicht.Was wir dir bieten:Ein Team, das deine Erfolge feiert – und den besten Humor im Datenuniversum.Intensive Einarbeitung, Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten und Zertifizierungen, um immer am Puls der Zeit zu bleiben.Flexible Arbeitszeiten und Remote-Optionen.30 Tage Urlaub (32 nach 2 Jahren, 35 nach 5 Jahren).Top-IT-Ausstattung deiner Wahl.Gesundheits- und Altersvorsorge sowie monatliche Vitamin-Boosts.Kaffee, Red Bull Flat und Snacks im Office – weil gute Daten auch gute Nerven brauchen.Bereit für deinen nächsten Karriereschritt?Dann bewirb dich jetzt und werde ein Teil der DatenPioniere – wir freuen uns, dich kennenzulernen!

Data Analyst.title: Senior Data Analyst, Product
Data Analyst.description: Hello, we are AMBOSS and we are looking for a Senior Data Analyst to join our team!About AMBOSSAMBOSS is a learning and clinical decision support tool striving to empower physicians across the globe to provide the best possible care. Our founders set out in 2011 to create a tool that they would have hoped to have as medical students and doctors. Since then we have grown to currently operate in 180 countries and have gained immense traction in Germany and the US. Currently, we are pursuing this mission with more than 500+ employees in our offices in Berlin, Cologne, New York, and Cagliari.Why Data & Analytics at AMBOSSJoin a high-trust, cross-functional team where data is the backbone of every product decision, experiment, and growth bet. Working side-by-side with Product, Engineering, Commercial, and Medical colleagues, you will turn a modern stack into reliable insights and scalable pipelines. Your contributions guide decisions that reach millions of learners and clinicians worldwide, directly advancing our mission to enable doctors to provide the best possible care.Business ImpactOwn the analytics strategy for all AMBOSS product domains—from user acquisition and onboarding through learning flows, clinical decision support, and commercial touch‑points. Partner with senior leadership to set KPIs, expose the biggest opportunities, and turn insights into roadmap and revenue impact. Guide the analytics craft across the organisation.Role OverviewA hands‑on yet strategic role: you will lead end‑to‑end analytics initiatives, coach analysts, and advance data quality and experimentation standards.What You Will DoDefine the analytics roadmap across onboarding, in‑product engagement, clinical usage, and shop flows.Drive deep‑dives (causal inference, cohort modelling, forecasting) and present recommendations to VP/C‑level stakeholders.Design, run, and evaluate A/B and multivariate tests; embed best practices across teams.Own core KPI frameworks and align measurement standards company‑wide.Identify data gaps, specify event‑tracking, and collaborate with Engineering on data reliability.Mentor mid‑level and junior analysts; lead knowledge‑sharing sessions.Champion scalable self‑service tooling and shape the evolution of our analytics stack. What you bring5 + years in product or marketing analytics within SaaS or consumer digital products.Expert SQL plus strong Python or R skills for statistical modelling.Demonstrated record of translating analysis into product or revenue wins.Deep understanding of experimental design, causal methods, and forecasting.Experience with BI / event‑tracking tools (Looker, Mixpanel, dbt, etc.).Clear, persuasive communication with both technical and executive audiences.Proven leadership: mentoring, stakeholder management, prioritisation. You enjoyOwning strategic questions end‑to‑end.Elevating team capabilities.Balancing quick wins with long‑term analytical foundations.BenefitsAMBOSSians tell us that innovative work keeps them energized and employee benefits help them to feel appreciated and empowered. We invest in every AMBOSSian with our employee benefits package, crafted to support financial, physical, and mental health, and work-life harmony.Check out all of our employee benefits in Germany below:https://go.amboss.com/the-amboss-prescription-deWe believe in diversity as a driving force of innovation and welcome people of all backgrounds to help us achieve our mission of empowering physicians to provide the best possible care - to everyone, everywhere.Did we just describe your ideal next role? We encourage you to apply even if you do not meet all of the requirements.

Data Analyst.title: Power BI Data Analyst (all genders)
Data Analyst.description: Are you motivated by challenges, variety, and learning? If you are a young professional who wants to start a career in IT, we have the right position for you! We are hiring a Power BI Data Analyst to join our project team in Munich. You will report directly to the project manager and support various projects with varying degrees of complexity. You are the business key contact and act as an interface between business and IT. Your main tasks will include gathering requirements analysis, documenting processes, analyzing data, and performing user acceptance testing.What Will You Do– Participate in cross-functional working group sessions to translate business requirements into system specifications;– Assist with the functional documentation of customer business requirements;– Analyze data sets identifying data anomalies, issues, and approaches to resolve discrepancies;– Conduct user acceptance testing and support investigation of questions, issues, and defects;– Managing the expectations and satisfaction of clients, projects sponsors, and stakeholders;– Managing projects, including stakeholder relationships.What Will Help You To Fulfill Your Role– A university degree in an IT or analytical field e.g., Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Finance, Economics, Business, or related fields;– Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills; Good Knowledge of Power BI, DAX, M, Power Query; Knowledge of a programming language like Python, SAS, SQL, or similar is beneficial;– Ability to work effectively with management and be part of a team to meet targets;– Strong attention to detail;– Good communication skills, both written and verbal;– Business proficiency in English and German. Proficiency in Italian is desired.What We Offer– A multitude of demanding projects in an international context; Transparent career program;– Professional in-house training programs, including on-the-job, constructive feedback, and coaching;– A flat hierarchy, which will not be tied up in politics;– Access to company benefits programs, including discounts and VIP memberships; Drinks and snacks in our offices;EMPLOYMENT TYPEFull timeINDUSTRYInformation TechnologyLOCATIONMunich (Germany)CONTACTFrancesco di CugnoConvolut GmbH | Radlkoferstr 2 | 81373 Münchentel: +49 89 80035334E-Mail: career@convolut.eu

Solutions Architect.title: Architect
Solutions Architect.description: Weigandt Consulting is a professional services company specializing in IT solutions for major retail enterprises. Our expertise includes Application Management Support, Implementation, Integration, and Modernization of ERP systems, as well as Prebuilt Solutions for the Retail Industry, Software Development, and IT Staff Augmentation. We are committed to delivering high-quality services that drive success for our customers.We are currently seeking an Architect for a long-term project with a global retailer based in the UK.Role OverviewAn Architect plays a critical role in aligning an organization’s technology strategy with its business goals by designing and overseeing the implementation of comprehensive IT architectures. This role requires a deep understanding of software, infrastructure, security, and data, along with expertise in architecture modeling, solution design, and problem-solving. By balancing strategic planning with hands-on technical leadership, the Architect ensures that technology investments deliver maximum business value while maintaining security, scalability, and efficiency.ResponsibilitiesWorks with business and technology stakeholders in the Finance and/or Colleague domain to understand their data needs and challenges;Translates business requirements into technical solutions for data acquisition, storage, transformation, and governance;Designs and implements conceptual and logical data models for financial data, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and scalability;Collaborates with Product and Engineering teams to ensure the successful implementation and integration of the financial data architecture;Creates and maintains data architecture artifacts, including the finance data model and data lineage;Ensures adherence to the client’s overall technology standards;Works with Product Owners to shape the product vision for data products;Partners with Product Owners and business stakeholders to define solutions that achieve the desired business outcomes;Collaborates with Engineering and other Enterprise Architects to shape the overall technology strategy for Weigandt’s client.Key Skills and Experience In-depth knowledge of software, infrastructure, security, and data, including architectural standards and tools;Familiarity with architecture frameworks such as TOGAF and the Zachman Framework;Experience with solution and design methodologies, including Domain-Driven Design (DDD), Event-Driven Architecture (EDA), Microservices, and API-First design;Proficiency in modeling tools and notations such as UML, BPMN, and C4;Expertise in architecture modeling, with a focus on creating and reviewing models to support business strategies;Strong solution-shaping and problem-solving skills, guiding solutions through their entire lifecycle;Experience in managing solution portfolios using Agile and Scrum methodologies for incremental improvement;Proficiency in technical writing, including the creation of standards, whitepapers, and cookbooks to clearly communicate technical concepts;Ability to critically assess new technologies and provide strategic recommendations;Experience ensuring compliance with security standards and integrating security into technology solutions;Proven ability to interpret business goals and translate them into effective technology solutions;Leadership in architecture design, influencing technology decisions across the organization;Strong communication skills, enabling effective collaboration with stakeholders and securing buy-in for architecture models and strategies;Ability to balance simplicity and complexity in architectural design to ensure scalability and efficiency.Soft Skills & Competencies Adaptability and strong organizational skills, with the ability to plan effectively while remaining responsive to changing prioritie;Creative problem-solving skills, combined with a proactive, self-starting attitude;Exceptional ability to build and maintain strong relationships with peers, senior leadership, and stakeholders across the organization;Excellent written, verbal, and presentation skills, with the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and confidently to audiences of all levels and disciplines;A tenacious, can-do attitude, with a commitment to driving results and overcoming challenges;A natural curiosity and a passion for continuous learning and self-improvement;Confidence to challenge the status quo constructively, while maintaining a collaborative approach;Strong influencing skills, with the ability to bring others along on the journey, ensuring alignment and support for strategic initiatives.ConditionsCompetitive fixed monthly salary (based on interview results);Business trips (India, Europe, UK – all travel expenses covered) and work with UK time zone GMT+0;Long-term international projects with modern technology stacks;Remote work format, full-time 40 hours per week, no night meetings;Benefits program, covering expenses for professional development, workplace setup, health, children, sports, services, and culture by your choice;Official contract in accordance with local legislation;Paid vacation of 28 working days and sick leaves;Company-provided modern IT equipment (Apple MacBook, HP, or Lenovo);Regular online and offline informal events, fostering a friendly atmosphere.

Solutions Architect.title: AWS Solution Architect
Solutions Architect.description: About The PositionAbout AllCloudAllCloud is a global professional services company that provides organizations with cloud enablement and transformation tools. As an AWS Premier Consulting Partner and audited MSP, a Salesforce Platinum Partner, and a Snowflake Premier Partner, AllCloud helps clients connect their front and back offices by building a new operating model to harness the benefits of cloud technology, data, and analytics.Job SummaryAllCloud seeks experienced and highly motivated technologists with technical depth and strong interpersonal skills. As an AWS Solution Architect, you will lead technical workshops, advise customers on architectural and strategic IT decisions, and design highly scalable, flexible, and resilient cloud architectures that address customer business challenges. As a trusted customer advocate, the solutions architect will help organizations understand best practices around advanced cloud-based solutions. Connecting technology with measurable business value is critical to a solutions architect.As a AWS Solution Architect, You WillLead technical workshops and advise customers on architectural and strategic IT decisionsEnsure success in designing, building, and migrating applications, software, and services on the AWS platformEducate customers on best practices to ensure their solutions are designed for successful deployment in the cloudWork with other AllCloud teams to ensure quality and customer successCapture and share knowledge with AllCloud’s technical experts communityActs as a technical liaison between customers, AllCloud’s DevOps, FinOps, and the account management teamsRequirementsTechnical degree: B.Sc Computer Science is highly desiredDemonstrated experience leading or developing high-quality, enterprise-scale distributed applications using modern software development practices and technologies is highly desiredFluency in German and English is essentialDemonstrated ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quicklyDemonstrated ability to architect and implement solutions on AWSSignificant experience in infrastructure architecture, database architecture, networking and securityHistory of successful technical consulting and architecture engagements with large-scale customers or enterprisesPresentation skills with a high degree of comfort speaking with executives, IT Management, and developers.Strong verbal and written communication skills are a must, as well as the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizationsExperience Solutions Architect.title: Solution Architect - Germany
Solutions Architect.description: Before jumping in on all the information about the role and what you can bring to the table, let us introduce ourselves real quick.About UsWe are Insider, a B2B SaaS company that drives growth for its clients around the world. How are we achieving this? We are the #1 AI-native platform for Customer Experience and Marketing—offers marketers a single platform to deliver unique experiences per person, drive profitable growth, and unleash peak productivity and efficiency. Our platform connects data across channels, predicts future behavior with AI, and individualizes experiences from a single platform.We have just celebrated our $500M Series E funding round, led by General Atlantic. Before this, we’ve unlocked unicorn status following our Series D round. We are backed by top-notch investors, including Sequoia Capital, QIA, Riverwood, and Endeavor Catalyst, and trusted by 1200+ brands from high-growth startups to the most prestigious Fortune 500 companies such as Samsung, Coca-Cola, Nike, L’Oreal, Singapore Airlines, Virgin, Nestle, Nissan, Lenovo, Puma, IKEA, Allianz, Dominos, CNN, and the list goes on.Having unlocked unicorn status, Insider was congratulated for becoming one of the only woman-founded, women-led B2B SaaS unicorns in the world, to achieve $200M in CARR (Committed Annual Recurring Revenue). Insider was named a leader in The Forrester Wave for Cross-Channel Campaign Management 2021, and Leader in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Omnichannel Marketing Platforms for B2C Enterprises 2023 Assessment. The company has been recognized in The Top 1% of all software companies worldwide in G2’s 2024 Software Awards, and named in The Top 10 Best Software Products with the most #1 rankings alongside other software legends like Google, Zoom, and Monday.com. According to G2’s Spring’24 reports. Insider is also the #1 G2 Leader in 6+ categories, including Customer Data Platforms (CDP), Personalization Engines, Personalization Software, Mobile Marketing, Customer Journey Analytics, and e-commerce Personalization.When our team founded Insider, they not only sought to create a product company but also to build the most socially progressive technology community in the world. Through our corporate social responsibility initiatives like 100Projects SheCodes, SheLeads, and SheMarkables, our community has committed to scaling its impact into our communities across 27+ countries, spearheading transformative projects in areas such as health, education, farming, animal rights, and increasing the proportional representation of women in STEM careers.Behind all these achievements, there is an exceptionally talented and passionate team across 27+ countries that moves fast and agile, creates cutting-edge products, and focuses on making an impact. If you want to join us on this journey, just keep reading.Our Partner Success Team consists of people from 31 different nationalities. They are how we thrive. They are our story makers. They are quick learners & problem solvers. They are the master problem solvers, they resolve, they care and they ignite. Each of them is part of harmonious teamwork that follows meaningful goals. Our Solution Architects are powered by their technical background and skills. They aim to provide seamless onboarding for our Partners while assisting with implementation. They are problem-solvers and strategic thinkers. They are the core when it comes to making sure that Partners are flawlessly onboarded for the maximum efficiency for Insider products. Until now it has been an inspiring story on our side, so we wanted to let you in on it. Now? Now we are looking to expand our team!Job DescriptionProactively engages with and reaches out to customer technical decision-makers and influencers. Utilizes information on customer business, industry, needs, competitive landscape, and key priorities to support customer's digital transformationRun data workshops to build plans for implementing solutions which align with customer business goals and technical environmentsDrives pilots, proof of concept (POC), and value (e.g., optimizing solutions and costs) and moves the customer forward from pilots to productive deployments by rooting pilots in business impactTroubleshoots technical issues reported by customers during the implementation and ongoing campaign deployment process and provide solutionsIdentifies, escalates, and works to resolve technical blockers (e.g., changing configurations, sample coding) to accelerate architecture implementations, and routes non-technical issues for removal by appropriate partiesProactively engages product and support teams (e.g., engineering) to remediate blockers by conveying impactLeverage best practices to guide customer strategy and future growth for Insider by cultivating customer affinity with Insider solutions that drive impact for the customer. What we expect from you?Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related fieldMinimum 5 years of experience in consultative/complex technical deployment projects, architecture, design, implementation, and/or support of highly distributed applicationsProven track record of building deep technical relationships with senior IT executives in large or highly strategic accountsOutstanding verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to orchestrate, lead, and influence virtual teams, ensuring successful implementation of customer projectsExtensive technical experience with cloud and hybrid infrastructures, architecture designs, migrations, and technology managementFamiliarity, awareness, or strong working knowledge of development methodologies and technologies in one or more of the following: JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS; REST, XML, Database TechnologiesYou have strong product command and technical domain knowledge of one or more of the following: SaaS, Marketing, Mobile Applications, APIs or ProgrammingWhile we are conquering the world, we are offering you;a chance to work in an international, diverse, and inclusive environment,“Tech Talks” with famous and groundbreaking people from the software world,to be part of an industry that’s shaping the future of customer experiences. Don't believe us? Just ask Google,access and opportunity to gain a limitless network all over the globeaccess to many hard and soft skills pieces of training to help you improve and challenge yourself,access to 16,000+ online courses taught by real-world professionals on the LinkedIn Learning platform to satisfy your hunger for knowledgespace to share your skills through training sessions and workshops if you wish. Sharing is caring!fun with the occasional team activities!Was this position made for you?So let’s talk! We’re curious bugs and can’t wait to get to know you.We provide equal opportunity in a zero-discrimination workplace and not just welcome but also embrace everyone without regard to sex, race, color, nationality, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability status, citizenship, or marital status.Please follow Insider on LinkedIn, Instagram, Youtube, and Medium!

Solutions Architect.title: Solution Architect
Solutions Architect.description: About The ProjectOur team works on a variety of internal and external projects focusing on AWS cloud solutions with particular emphasis on AI/ML implementations and cloud migrations. The role balances between supporting internal initiatives (AWS funding applications, competency programs, presales) and leading client-facing engagements across diverse industries including IT, telecommunications, retail, and entertainment, with a special focus on Financial Services (banking, insurance, wealth management).On internal projects, you'll create reusable solution architectures, develop demos, and produce technical assets for presales activities. For client engagements, you'll design and implement cloud architectures optimized for performance, cost, security, and reliability, with specific attention to AI/ML workloads and migration pathways.Duration: Long-term, full-time engagementStage: Ongoing work (mixture of new development, implementation, and support)ObjectiveThe Solution Architect role aims to drive technical excellence and business growth through the following key objectives:Design and implement innovative AWS (Azure and GCP) cloud architectures for both internal initiatives and client projects, with measurable improvements in performance, security, and cost-efficiencySuccessfully secure AWS funding through programs like PoC and MAP, with a target of application time is 2 days for PoC fundingsExpand our AWS competency portfolio by leading at least two new competency applications per year, focusing on Migration and Financial Services specializationsSupport sales teams on proposals requiring technical architecture inputDeliver on AWS Marketplace a minimum of four reusable solution accelerators annually that can be leveraged across multiple client engagementsEnsure all customer implementations meet or exceed AWS Well-Architected framework standards, maintaining a remediation completion rate of at least 50%Drive adoption of AI/ML solutions across our client base, targeting implementation of at least three production-grade AI/ML projects per yearKPIAchieve a 90% success rate on AWS funding applications submittedSuccessfully secure AWS funding through programs like PoC and MAP, with a target of application time is 2 days for PoC fundingsComplete and document at least 20 AWS Well-Architected reviews annuallyDeliver a minimum of 4 reusable solution accelerators or demos per year that demonstrably reduce time-to-marketIncrease AWS certification portfolio at all level (Foundation, Associate and Pro/Spec) by 30% annually in certification number. Meet or exceed 50% billable utilization target while balancing internal initiativesAchieve Premier Tier AWS Partnership within a 1 yearAreas of ResponsibilityDesign and implement cloud architectures with special emphasis on AI/ML workloads and migration pathways, including technical documentation and cost optimization strategiesLead AWS funding program applications (PoC, MAP, AI/ML specialized) by creating comprehensive technical artifacts, conducting TCO analyses, and managing stakeholder communicationDevelop reusable solution accelerators and demos for presales activities that showcase innovative approaches to common industry challengesConduct AWS Well-Architected reviews, identify critical gaps, and guide remediation processes to ensure best practices implementationSupport sales teams during proposal development and customer presentations by translating complex technical solutions into business value propositionsSkillsCloud architecture design and implementation with deep expertise in AWS services, particularly in AI/ML and data processingAWS Professional or Specialty certifications are required (Solutions Architect Professional, DevOps Professional, or Data Analytics/Machine Learning Specialty)Solution design documentation and architectural diagramming with clear articulation of technical and business requirementsAWS funding program navigation and application development with proven track record of securing approvalsFinancial analysis and cloud economics with ability to create compelling TCO models and ROI justificationsAdvanced technical communication and presentation skills for explaining complex solutions to diverse audiencesAI/ML solution development including practical experience implementing machine learning workflows and pipelinesIndustry knowledge in Financial Services (banking, insurance, wealth management) and regulatory compliance requirements. Security and compliance expertise with knowledge of implementing secure architectures that meet regulatory requirements (GDPR, PCI-DSS, ISO27001, etc.)Technical presales and consultation with ability to translate business problems into technical solutionsKnowledgeIn-depth understanding of AWS cloud services architecture, particularly services related to AI/ML, data analytics, and migrationComprehensive knowledge of AWS funding programs, eligibility criteria, and application processesAdvanced understanding of cloud security frameworks and compliance requirements for regulated industriesCurrent awareness of industry trends and emerging technologies in cloud computing, with particular focus on AI/ML applicationsFamiliarity with Financial Services industry challenges, use cases, and technical requirementsExperienceMinimum 5 years of experience in solution architecture with at least 3 years specifically focused on AWS cloud technologiesDemonstrated track record of successfully securing and implementing AWS funding programs (MAP, PoC, etc.)Experience leading or contributing to at least 3 enterprise-scale AI/ML implementations from concept to productionPrior experience with AWS Partner Network (APN) activities including competency programs and marketplace listingsHistory of successful technical presales engagements and RFP responses with measurable win ratesExperience working with Financial Services clients and implementing solutions that meet industry regulatory requirements

Solutions Architect.title: Enterprise Architect (m/w/d) - bundesweit
Solutions Architect.description: HSO ist einer der führenden Microsoft Partner und gehört zum Microsoft Inner Circle, in dem sich die besten 1 % aller Microsoft-Partner weltweit befinden. Wir sind in Europa, Nordamerika, Asien und Australien vertreten und beraten mit mehr als 2.500 Mitarbeiter:innen namhafte Kunden bei komplexen IT-Projekten auf der ganzen Welt. Unser Ziel ist es, die Strategie unserer Kunden mit der Microsoft Cloud Technologie in Einklang zu bringen, um einen echten Mehrwert zu generieren. Hierfür suchen wir dich - einen erfahrenen Enterprise Architekten (m/w/d) - mit umfassender technischer Expertise für unser Team in Deutschland. In dieser zentralen Rolle fungierst du als wichtige Schnittstelle zwischen technischen und funktionalen Aspekten von groß angelegten Transformationsprojekten auf Basis von Microsoft Cloud- und Drittanbieterlösungen. Pre-Sales: Du unterstützt unser Sales- und Pre Sales-Team bei der Definition der HSO Value Propositions. Du zeigst unseren Kunden auf, welchen „Mehrwert" HSO mit der Microsoft Cloud für ausgewählte Industrien liefern kann. Du begleitest unsere Industry-Leads, Projektmanager und „Blackbelts" in Sales-Projekten Technology Roadmap: Du nutzt dein vielfältiges Wissen über Microsoft-Lösungen wie Azure, Dynamics 365 F&O, CE, Power Platform, Data, AI usw., um integrierte, skalierbare Lösungen für unsere Kunden aufzuzeigen und Projekte zu definieren Strategische Projektplanung: Auf Basis der Geschäftsziele und Anforderungen unserer Kunden triffst du technologische Entscheidungen, entwickelst umfassende Systemarchitekturen und leitest daraus Arbeitspakete zur Planung und Steuerung des Projektes ab Technische Umsetzung: In der Design- und Implementierungsphase unterstützt du das Projektteam bei der technischen Umsetzung und entwickelst Strategien, um den Projekterfolg sicherzustellen Stakeholder Engagement: Du bist Teil der Project-Governance für „Enterprise"- und „Platform-Projekte". Zusammen mit den Projektmanagern pflegst du enge Beziehungen zu internen und externen Stakeholdern, einschließlich C-Level Executives und den technischen Projekt-Teams Weiterbildung: Du hältst dich zu neuen Trends und Lösungen, die über das Microsoft-Ökosystem oder andere zugehörige Lösungen von Drittanbietern verfügbar werden, auf dem Laufenden. Beispiele sind Open AI, Machine Learning, CoPilot und wie diese über die D365-Landschaft genutzt werden könnenRequirementsEin abgeschlossenes Studium in Betriebswirtschaft, Informatik, Ingenieurwesen oder einer verwandten Disziplin oder ein vergleichbarer Berufsabschluss mit relevanter ErfahrungDu verfügst über mehr als 5 Jahre praktische Erfahrung in der Softwareimplementierung und hast mindestens 3 größere Enterprise Projekte oder -Programme geleitetAuf C-Level agierst du sicher und überzeugst durch dein Fachwissen zu Technologien, Branchen und ProzessenDu bringst ein breites Verständnis der Microsoft-Technologieplattform sowie ein tiefergehendes Verständnis für die Microsoft Business Applications mitDu bist am Puls der Zeit und verfolgst die Entwicklungen im Microsoft Umfeld auf der Azure Platform mit BegeisterungDu verfügst über eine sehr gute verbale und schriftliche Kommunikations- und Präsentationsfähigkeit auf Deutsch und EnglischIn einem dynamischen Umfeld bewegst du dich sicher und eignest dir fortlaufend neues Wissen anEine gewisse Reisebereitschaft wird ebenfalls vorausgesetztBenefits Result Orientation: Du arbeitest bei einem der weltweit größten und erfolgreichsten Microsoft-Partner im Bereich Microsoft Dynamics 365 und kannst damit die digitale Transformation vorantreiben Self-Determination: Wir kommunizieren auf Augenhöhe - mit deinen Ideen und Erfahrungen kannst du dich bei uns einbringen, eigenständig handeln und damit den Unternehmenserfolg aktiv mitgestalten Team Spirit: Da Menschen bei HSO den Unterschied machen, kannst du dich auf eine unterstützende, vertrauensvolle und wertschätzende Arbeitsatmosphäre freuen Career Coaching: Die berufliche und persönliche Entwicklung unserer Mitarbeiter:innen fördern wir durch unsere hauseigene HSO Academy, definierte Karrierepfade, regelmäßige Trainings und Feedback Onboarding@HSO: Wir heißen dich in unserem Office in Böblingen willkommen - du startest deine ersten Onboarding-Tage bei uns vor Ort, um dich mit unserer Unternehmenskultur, unseren Prozessen und Tools vertraut zu machen Hybrid-Workforce: Bei uns hast Du die Möglichkeit mobil, im Homeoffice oder in einem unserer Offices in Böblingen, München, Chemnitz oder Nürnberg zu arbeiten Appreciation: Ein attraktives Gehaltspaket inklusive Zuschuss zur betrieblichen Altersvorsorge, Firmenfitness, Dienstradleasing, Mitarbeiterrabatte und außergewöhnliche Teamevents runden dein HSO-Feel-Good-Paket abHSO fördert aktiv Vielfalt und Inklusion. Wir begrüßen Bewerbungen von allen qualifizierten Personen - unabhängig von ethnischer Herkunft, Hautfarbe, Religion, Geschlecht, sexueller Orientierung, Geschlechtsidentität, nationaler Herkunft, Behinderung oder Alter. Wir setzen uns für ein diskriminierungsfreies Arbeitsumfeld ein, in dem Chancengleichheit gefördert und die Unterschiedlichkeit jedes Einzelnen respektiert und wertgeschätzt wird.

Solutions Architect.description: Penta Consulting are a technology service provider and leading outsourced partner helping to deliver professional and managed solutions across EMEA.We are supporting a well esteemed client of ours searching for a Cloud Solution Architect in Germany for a 12 month extendable contract.Job Description:A key technical resource for customers in Germany on the Microsoft Infrastructure platformLead proactive technical trainings and workshops to provide expert technical guidance in line with industry best practicesDevelop customer relationships, drive innovative solutions & product adoptionKey Requirements:Strong communication skills and ability to understand client requirements and design/implement solutions based on client requirements Excellent presentation skills and ability to manage customer expectations 5+ years experience with Windows Server - Failover Clustering/High Availability/Disaster Recovery/File Services, Windows Performance Tuning and Troubleshooting, WSUS, Windows AutopatchHands on experience with designing + implementing Hyper-V + SCVMM solutions PowerShell Good knowledge on Identity and Access Management (Active Directory + Entra ID)Strong experience with Azure Cloud Services such as: Azure IaaS (Storage, networking, security), Azure Network Security, Azure Virtual Desktop, Azure Migrate, Azure Policy, Azure Update Manager, Azure Files, Digital Twins, Files, Azure Arc, Azure Backup, Azure IoT, Azure Files

Solutions Architect.title: Solution Architect (m/w/d)
Solutions Architect.description: Solution Architect (m/w/d)Du bist Experte im Bereich Architekturdesign und hast Lust, innovative Softwarelösungen weiterzuentwickeln? Dann bist Du bei uns genau richtig!Als zentraler Technologiepartner entwickeln wir bei ADNOVA Software und Services exklusiv für die LAND-DATA GmbH (www.landdata.de) sowie für die Just Farming GmbH (www.just-farming.de) innovative Softwarelösungen. Wir spezialisieren uns auf die Entwicklung von maßgeschneiderten Backend-Services und die Gestaltung intuitiver Frontend-Interfaces, die speziell auf die Bedürfnisse und Ziele der Anwender abgestimmt sind. Unser Angebot umfasst zudem Prozessanalysen und Technologieberatung, um die digitale Expertise von LAND-DATA und Just Farming in ihren jeweiligen Märkten weiter zu stärken.Deine Aufgaben:Entwicklung von Architekturdesigns und Optimierung von Softwarelösungen, die Geschäftsanforderungen erfüllen und langfristig skalierbar sind. Auswahl geeigneter Technologien, Tools und Plattformen unter Berücksichtigung von Wirtschaftlichkeit, Sicherheit und Skalierbarkeit. Enge Zusammenarbeit mit Entwicklern, Projektmanagern und weiteren Stakeholdern zur Abstimmung der Anforderungen. Design und Leitung der Integration von bestehenden Systemen mit neuen Anwendungen und Services. Sicherstellung von Qualitätskriterien, sodass alle Lösungen robust, sicher und performant sind. Identifikation von Trends und neuen Technologien, die die Effizienz und Wettbewerbsfähigkeit des Unternehmens steigern können. Erstellung von Architektur-Dokumentationen, Präsentationen und Leitlinien für technische Teams. Das solltest Du mitbringen:Mindestens 3–5 Jahre Berufserfahrung als Solution Architect oder in einer ähnlichen Rolle. Tiefgehende Kenntnisse in modernen Technologien, Cloud-Architekturen, Microservices, APIs und Datenbanken. Analytisches Denken und die Fähigkeit, komplexe technische und geschäftliche Herausforderungen strukturiert zu lösen. Erfahrung in der Zusammenarbeit mit agilen Teams und cross-funktionalen Einheiten. Erfahrung mit Jira, Confluence und agilen Softwareentwicklungsmethoden. Starke Präsentations- und Moderationsfähigkeiten, um technische Sachverhalte auch Nicht-Technikern verständlich zu machen. Das bieten wir Dir:Familiäres Arbeitsklima: Flache Hierarchien und kurze Entscheidungswege schaffen ein positives & kollegiales MiteinanderFreiraum für kreative Ideen: Gestalte mit & bring Deine Vorschläge aktiv einFlexible Arbeitszeiten & bis zu 95 % Mobile Office: Damit Du Arbeit und Privatleben optimal vereinbaren kannstModerneste technische Ausstattung: Du erhältst modernste Tools und Technik, um effizient und produktiv zu arbeitenUmfassende Einarbeitung & persönliche Betreuung: Wir stehen dir von Anfang an zur SeiteAttraktives Vergütungspaket: Wir bieten Dir eine faire und wettbewerbsfähige VergütungIndividuelle Weiterbildungsangebote: Entwickle Dich kontinuierlich weiter, wir unterstützen Dich dabei30 Tage Urlaub für Deine ErholungJobrad: Fahre umweltbewusst und gesund mit dem RadFirmenfitness-Angebot mit EGYM Wellpass  für Gesundheit, Wohlbefinden und den Spaß an BewegungMitarbeitervorteilsportal: Profitiere von einem monatlichen Budget für Mobilität, Gesundheit und mehrKostenlose Unfallversicherung: Damit Du rundum abgesichert bistBetriebliche Altersversorgung: Für eine sichere ZukunftKlingt das nach Deiner nächsten Herausforderung? Dann bewirb Dich jetzt und gestalte mit uns die Zukunft datenbasierter Lösungen! Wir freuen uns darauf, Dich kennenzulernen.

Solutions Architect.title: Solutions Architect (TAM)
Solutions Architect.description: Pivotal Partners is exclusively partnered to scale leading cloud-based business process automation provider which helps modern enterprises excel in the digital age by automating their IT, finance and general business processes.Job Title:  Solutions Architect /Technical Customer Success ManagerLocation: GermanySalary: 145-155K OTE (80/20)About the RoleWe’re seeking a Technical Account Manager (TAM) to manage post-sales relationships with key enterprise customers. You’ll ensure successful solution implementations, maximize customer value, and drive retention and growth through strong technical guidance and relationship management.What You’ll DoOwn and manage post-sales relationships with key enterprise accounts.Act as the main point of contact for technical support, escalations, and ongoing engagement.Lead regular Health Checks, Use Case Workshops, and Business Reviews.Collaborate with internal teams (Product, Engineering, Support) to drive issue resolution and continuous improvement.Provide insights and recommendations to align our solutions with customer goals.Identify risks early and develop action plans to ensure customer success and retention.What We’re Looking For3–5 years of experience in technical consulting, enterprise support, or account management.Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to understand complex technical environments.Excellent communication skills in German and English (written & verbal).Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Systems, or equivalent.Technical familiarity with JavaScript, SAP ABAP, SQL Developer is a plus.Project management and IT certifications (e.g. PMP, ITIL, Six Sigma) are a bonus.You’ll Succeed If You HaveA proactive, customer-obsessed mindset.Ability to build relationships with both technical teams and senior stakeholders.Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.Comfort working in a fast-paced environment managing multiple accounts and priorities.Looking forward to hearing from you!

Solutions Architect.title: Integration Architect – Cloud & API-Driven Solutions – Germany – 100.000 EUR
Solutions Architect.description: Integration Architect – Cloud & API-Driven Solutions – Germany – 100.000 EURAbout the Role Are you passionate about designing and implementing scalable, cloud-native integration solutions? We are looking for an Integration Architect to help our customers build modern, API-first, and event-driven architectures using leading cloud platforms and containerised environments.What You’ll Do ✅ Architect & Deploy Integration Solutions – Design cloud-based integration architectures leveraging APIs, Kubernetes, and event streaming platforms ✅ Develop & Optimise APIs – Work with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, Kafka, WebSockets for seamless connectivity ✅ Cloud-Native Implementation – Utilise AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, Helm, Docker to deploy and manage integrations ✅ Automation & CI/CD – Implement Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation) and GitOps-driven CI/CD pipelines ✅ Security & Compliance – Ensure API security best practices (OAuth2, OpenID, Zero Trust) are followed ✅ Technical Leadership – Act as a trusted adviser, conduct workshops, and mentor engineering teamsWhat You Bring 🔹 5+ years’ experience in API management, microservices, and cloud-native integration 🔹 Proficiency in Java, JavaScript, or Python 🔹 Hands-on experience with Kubernetes, Docker, Helm, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) 🔹 Strong understanding of CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation), and GitOps (ArgoCD, Flux) 🔹 Knowledge of API security (OAuth2, OpenID, JWT), enterprise integration tools (Apache Camel, API Gateways) 🔹 Excellent communication and consulting skills to translate business needs into scalable integration architecturesWhy Join Us? 🚀 Work on cutting-edge integration technologies 🌍 Collaborate with global clients in a fast-paced environment 📈 Grow your skills in cloud, DevOps, and security

Cybersecurity Analyst.title: Cyber Security Engineer (all gender)
Cybersecurity Analyst.description: Wir sind die Gestalter von heute für die Welt von morgen.Als einer der weltweit führender Entwicklungsdienstleister setzen wir uns bei ALTEN dafür ein, die Zukunft unserer Partner, die Karrieren unserer Mitarbeiter und die Herausforderungen für unsere Gesellschaft und Umwelt positiv zu gestalten.Mehr als 50.000 Mitarbeiter in 30 Ländern arbeiten schon heute an
